parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden breakage of the clutch fork shaft can cause a loss of control, leading to potential accidents, especially when driving in motion. The failure can also cause a sudden loss of speed, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The clutch fork shaft breaks in half
resulting in a sudden loss of speed
jolting the driver and passengers
and making it difficult or impossible to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the clutch disc can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to potential accidents, especially when driving in heavy traffic or uphill. The failure can also lead to sudden loss of speed, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The clutch disc fails
resulting in the loss of power
making it difficult or impossible to shift gears
and causing the vehicle to slow down suddenly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling Due to Electrical System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden engine stalling without warning can cause loss of control, accidents, or leave the driver stranded, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine shuts down without prior warning
the vehicle stalls while driving
the engine dies while idling
the electrical system malfunctions
the coil assembly fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shifting of the tire belt can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in property damage, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle becomes difficult to control
the vehicle pulls to one side
the tire makes a loud noise
the tire vibrates excessively
the tire shows signs of uneven wear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rusted Brake Lines and ABS Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rusting of brake lines and ABS components can cause brake fluid to leak, leading to a loss of brake pressure, increased stopping distances, and potentially, accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal travels to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the ABS warning light illuminates
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Balance Shaft and Shaft Fork Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The repeated failure of the balance shaft and shaft fork can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The balance shaft breaks
the shaft fork breaks
the vehicle experiences loss of control
the vehicle is unable to operate properly.
